name: Fishy Fishies
description:
# Fishy Fishies

Compete in the field with your sharp fish scales, push and hit the ball into the goal to score points for your team! The game is always played 2v2, with players or AIs.

### Number of players

Up to 4 players (local multiplayer*)

### Controllers

- Keyboard and mouse

- Xbox controllers (recommended)

- PS4 controllers may require additional software such as DS4Windows

- Pro Controllers* may require additional software such as BetterJoy

(* => Pro Switch Controllers may require controller callibration.)

### Controls

- Movement: Use **W, A, S, D** or your **Left Thumbstick** in your controller

- Weak hit: **Left mouse click** or Y (Xbox) or Triangle (PS4) or X (Pro Controller)

- Heavy hit: **Right click** or B (Xbox) or Circle (PS4) or A (Pro Controller)

- Dash: **Middle Click** or F (Keyboard) or X (Xbox) or Square (PS4) or Y (Pro Controller)

- Jump: **Space** or A (Xbox) or X (PS4) or B (Pro Controller)

- Speed Up: **Left shift** or R button (Xbox / PS4 / Pro Controller)

- Hold to Confirm (in some menus): **R** (Keyboard / Any controller)

### How to play

- Download and open the game (.exe file inside the .zip)

- Press any button

- Navigate the menus using **W, A, S, D** or **Left Thumbstick** or **D-pad**, and select a menu option using **Spacebar** or your controller's buttons

- Select Single Player or Multiplayer (requires additional controllers)

- Fish Selection

    - Use **W, A, S, D** or **Left Thumbstick** to move your cursor above the fish character you would like to play

    - When all players have selected a fish, hold **R** to continue

- Multiplayer:

    - Connect controllers to play in local multiplayer, select Multiplayer from the Main Menu and then select how many players

- Team Selection

    - Use **W, A, S, D** or **Left Thumbstick** to move your cursor over your selected team

    - When all players have selected a team, hold **R** to continue

Developed by:

- Daniel Ricardo Gallegos Pérez

- Elizabeth J. Gándara Canales

- Edgar Hiram Hernández Reyes
